span.span:
APRIL 28, 2020 BOARD OF EDUCATION MEETING: See the attached Public Notice regarding the April 28, 2020 Board of Education meeting. Questions may be submitted via email up to 15 minutes prior to the Board meeting - boe@doverschools.org.
SUPPLEMENTAL NUTRITION ASSISTANCE PROGRAM (SNAP): If you need help buying food, SNAP can help. Click this link for more information. If you are already receiving SNAP assistance, click HERE for information regarding Emergency Supplemental SNAP benefits for households not already receiving the maximum benefit.
PPE DONATION DRIVE: 4/19 and 4/22 from 10am-6pm. Click this link for more information.
APRIL 14, 2020 - BOARD OF EDUCATION MEETING VIDEO

span.style: text-decoration-line: underline; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Source Sans Pro", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(42, 43, 44);

p.span: CHILD CARE COUNCIL OF DUTCHESS and PUTNAM, INC - CHILDCARE FOR ELIGIBLE PROFESSIONALS:

Some professionals integral to the fight against the Coronavirus are eligible for child care for their young dependents. For child care information please complete the initial online survey and a Referral Specialist will contact you. You can also call a Referral Specialist - 845-473-4141 ext. 221.

a.title: Click here to view all news

div.p: Our mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society.

We are “Committed to Excellence”, and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community. Our goal and responsibility is to help each student develop an enthusiasm for learning, a respect for self and others, and the skills to become a creative independent thinker and problem solver.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
